title: Bessent Gives Rare Verbal Support to Korean Won, Sparking Rally
description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent called out excessive declines in South Korea’s won on Wednesday, offering rare verbal support to the currency as it slides toward its weakest since 2009.
content: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent called out excessive declines in South Korea’s won on Wednesday, offering rare verbal support to the currency as it slides toward its weakest since 2009.
